thread.title: Brooklyn Beckham looks so much like his famous dad David in this snap that fans do a double take
thread.title_full: Brooklyn Beckham looks so much like his famous dad David in this snap that fans do a double take

author: Vicki Newman
title: Brooklyn Beckham looks so much like his famous dad David in this snap that fans do a double take
text:
Brooklyn Beckham looks so much like his famous dad David in this snap that fans do a double take Fans couldn't get over the resemblance Share Brooklyn Beckham looks JUST like his dad! (Photo: Instagram / brooklynbeckham / Getty) Share Get celebs     
Brooklyn Beckham is the double of his famous dad in this amazing snap. 
Fans couldn't get over the family resemblance of David and his eldest son after seeing the picture. 
It was posted by Brooklyn, 17, on Instagram, alongside the caption: "Country day". 
In the black and white picture, Brooklyn is sitting in a car, where trees can be seen through the far-side window. 
He poses up alongside an adorable little dog as he gives the camera a smoldering look. Read More Brooklyn is all grown up now (Photo: WENN.com) 
He's dressed casually - ready for his country day - in a beanie hat, jacket and T-shirt. 
But it wasn't his outfit that caught his fans' attention. 
They couldn't believe how much he looked like his famous footballing dad. 
"I legit thought this David," said one. [sic] Is that you, David? (Photo: Instagram / brooklynbeckham) 
Another commented: "Is this the young david beckham like father like son" 
One wrote: "you look like your dad in this pic omg" 
And another asked: "IS THAT U DAVID?!" 
"Defo look like your dad here!," said another. [sic] 
Brooklyn, who is big brother to Romeo, Cruz and Harper, seems to also be going for a more mature look in the pic, by growing in some facial hair. Read More The Beckhams are super close (Photo: Instagram) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
